original_text:
The poor is disliked even by his neighbor,
    but the rich has many friends.
korean_text: 가난한 자는 이웃에게도 미움을 받게 되나 부요한 자는 친구가 많으니라

sentences.original_text: The poor is disliked even by his neighbor
sentences.korean_translation: 가난한 자는 심지어 그 이웃에게도 미움을 받는다

sentences.original_text: but the rich has many friends.
